title: Marketing Point Persons
text:
A. Privileges

Access to UP JMA’s marketing database

Advise on how to use the different documents of the JMaK

Guidance on different approaches to marketing

Candidacy for Member Marketer of the Semester

B. Responsibilities

Security of the JMaK and the database

Link between TMS and team regarding marketing activities

Preservation of UP JMA’s brand and image through professionalism
